descriptionHtml:
You have to put the data folder in your Skyrim folder.
The Assassins Creed Revelations Armour replaces Dark Brotherhood Robes Clothes.
To have it you have to press ยบ button an write:
-For Shrouded Shoes = player.additem 000cf89f 1
-For Shrouded Robes = player.additem 000cf8a0 1
-For Shrouded Hood = player.additem 000cf8a1 1
-For Shrouded Hand Wraps = player.additem 000cf8a9 1

Thanks!!!!!!
author: LordOfWar
